Name: Aisalkyn
description:
Aisalkyn is 64 years old, divorced, and has three children. She has a secondary education. She is engaged in farming, which she started 30 years ago. Thanks to her persistent hard work, at present her farm has two cows and 20 sheep. She also has 0.54 hectares of irrigated land on which she grows watermelons.

In order to further develop her farm, she has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 60,000 som (KGS) to purchase fertilisers for growing organic watermelons. She intends to use the funds from the loan to further expand her business.
